name: Rounded Rocky Walls
description:
Rounded Rocky Walls is a rythme/arcade game where which you should avoid obstacles which appear with the music to do the most combos, so the most points, as possible. Your adventure will appens in a circular arena where which controls were slighty modified, but I say nothing more about that, I let you see that by yourself ;). The game will request you agility and dexterity to pass the most complexe tests that you could encounter by the eight levels availables made by Mathiouza. Why do I specify that it is me who have did these levels ? Quite simply because a level editor is incorporated in the game, but ... You will have to find it ;). You will be able to do some levels with your favorites musics and to share them with your friends !
Uh ! As one final point ... Obstacles did not look like to rock x)
I hope you will enjoy the game !

Special thanks to Sylvain Adas who made an original music for the game !

Game made in August 2016.
